operations.name: Images
operations.brief: Operations that represent a browser or a mobile app downloading an image resource over the network.

operations.name: Scripts
operations.brief: Operations that represent a browser or a mobile app downloading a JavaScript resource over the network.

operations.name: CSS
operations.brief: Operations that represent a browser or a mobile app downloading a CSS stylesheet resource over the network.

operations.name: Links
operations.brief: Operations that represent a browser or a mobile app accessing a link resource.
